actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the allocation of low income housing credits to buildings for which rehabilitation or construction is delayed due to federally declared disasters.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the allocation of low income housing credits to buildings for which rehabilitation or construction is delayed due to a federally declared disaster occurring after September 1, 1989.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the allocation of low income housing credits to buildings for which rehabilitation or construction is delayed due to federally declared disasters.
